name: InnerPeace
0:
”Alexa, open inner peace”
”Alexa, ask inner peace for the latest talk”
”Alexa, start inner peace”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: inner peace
des: Listen to the latest guided meditations and discussions about creating more inner peace in our lives. Joe Segal enters a state of flow creating and sharing guided meditations for invoking love and peace and connecting to our higher power for our greater good. New talks will be shared about topics like letting go of resistance to change, the power of visualization, gratitude and living a life focused on compassion to create peaceful happy lives.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
